mapper.select: select o.*, p.name as productName, pps.sku_name as skuName, yw.real_name as workerName, yr.region_name as region_name from yxx_order o left join pms_product p on o.product_id = p.id left join pms_product_sku pps on o.sku_id = pps.id left join yxx_worker yw on o.worker_id = yw.id left join yxx_region yr on o.region_id = yr.region_id where o.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
